[Page Title: Taste Of India Charleston]

HOURS
Open daily, closed Tuesdays: 11:30 AM – 3:00 PM Serving lunch buffet from 5:00 PM – 10:00 PM (à la carte) 
Arguably Charleston’s most awarded Indian restaurant, Taste of India has earned its reputation for traditional yet creative cuisine.
MENU ABOUT GALLERY RESERVATION 
LOCATION

Phone: |
1280, Sam Rittenberg Blvd,
Charleston, SC 29407 843-556-4444 843-556-0772 
A true gem in the heart of Charleston!! The food is excellent and the staff is friendly and respectful. We have been coming to Taste of India for years, and it is our favorite Indian restaurant.

Armand Duplessis

A
B
O
U
T

is one of best and most successful family-owned restaurants. Established by the Bhalla Family in 1980, much of Taste of India’s achievements are to the credit of Naresh Kumar Bhalla, who has been a driving force behind the popularity of the restaurant. The freshest spices and ingredients available ensure that the Taste of India’s North India-style cuisine never disappoints.If you are new to Indian cuisine, we welcome you and hope you will feel free to ask questions! If you are already a fan of Indian food, we are sure you will find our dishes to be amongst the best you have ever tasted.
